long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Syntax Highlight Previewer.

This extension allows you to preview syntax highlighted code.

It is very simple to use.
Simply paste the code you wish to syntax highlight into the "Code" field and select the program language in the "Language" field.
You can also change the style of the "Preview" area under "Editor Style.

The copyright of this extension is owned by the author.  
I, my associates, and my organization are not responsible for any problems, damages, or defects resulting from the use of this extension. Use of this extension is at your own risk.

Code Location: https://github.com/BIGtanukiudon/syntax-highlight-viewer
